Browserstack.

name: Charles
ring: Adopt: we regularly use these on our projects

name: EarlGrey

name: Error guessing
ring: Adopt: we regularly use these on our projects
description: In software testing, error guessing is a test method in which test cases used to find bugs in programs are established based on experience in prior testing. The scope of test cases usually rely on the software tester involved, who uses past experience and intuition to determine what situations commonly cause software failure, or may cause errors to appear. Error guessing.

name: Espresso
ring: Adopt: we regularly use these on our projects
description: Use Espresso to write concise, beautiful, and reliable Android UI tests. The core API is small, predictable, and easy to learn and yet remains open for customization. Espresso tests state expectations, interactions, and assertions [...]. Espresso tests run optimally fast! It lets you leave your waits, syncs, sleeps, and polls behind while it manipulates and asserts on the application UI when it is at rest. Espresso.

name: Exploratory testing
ring: Adopt: we regularly use these on our projects
